pageContext.title: Post Format: Gallery
pageContext.content:
You can use this page to test the Theme’s handling of the gallery shortcode, including the columns parameter, from 1 to 9 columns. Themes are only required to support the default setting (3 columns), so this page is entirely optional.

One Column

Two Columns

Three Columns

Four Columns

Five Columns

Six Columns

Seven Columns

Eight Columns

Nine Columns
